item.title: New experiment
item.description: last modified: 2023-11-05 by Kodai Okawa If you installed with “curl” command explained previous chapter, you should have artnew command. This command will make new experiment directory interactively.

item.title: Online-mode analysis
item.description: last modified: 2023-12-12 by Kodai Okawa We often use “nssta” (non-save mode start) analysis in the beam tuning. It is not necessary to take data, but we need to check the beam condition by using artemis. In this case, TRIDFEventStore can be used as online mode.

item.title: New user
item.description: last modified: 2023-11-05 by Kodai Okawa After artnew command, you can see new directory of config files.

item.title: User config
item.description: last modified: 2024-01-20 by Kodai Okawa Warning still under consideration in this part!

item.title: Build
item.description: last modified: 2023-11-14 by Kodai Okawa Before starting analysis, you need to build. The current version of the artemis use “cmake” so the following steps must be taken.

item.title: New commands
item.description: last modified: 2024-01-20 by Kodai Okawa Various commands (mainly the same with ANAPAW commands) have been developed for CRIB experiment. For more information, please click here (src-crib/commands). These commands are registered in userlogon.C. (See previous section.)

item.title: Map configuration
item.description: last modified: 2023-11-14 by Kodai Okawa From this section, we start to configure the settings according to the actual experimental setup. The setting files are followings:

item.title: artemis
item.description: last modified: 2024-03-21 by Kodai Okawa From the current situation, CRIB experiment doesn’t use GET system, so we describe how to install it without linking it to GET decoder.

item.title: mount setting
item.description: last modified: 2024-03-21 by Kodai Okawa For the convinience, we use one directory to store raw data (ridf files) and make symbolic link to each user work directory. So first, we need to make raw data directory.

item.title: energyloss calculator
item.description: last modified: 2024-07-16 by Kodai Okawa Some CRIB-specific files use energy loss libraries.

item.title: art_analysis
item.description: last modified: 2024-03-21 by Kodai Okawa With this command, all initial settings of “art_analysis” are made.

item.title: Minor changes
item.description: last modified: 2024-01-11 by Kodai Okawa thisartemis.sh.in Grammar issue I think.
